body:
I'd like to push this off to 1.8; it's a hard problem, and we've made other progress for the pathological functions that trigger this:
 - https://go-review.googlesource.com/c/22790/ (iterate backwards when single predecessor)
 - https://go-review.googlesource.com/c/22342/ (sparse phi placement)

and we have two more CLs queued up for 1.8 ( or possibly 1.7 if sufficiently horrible inputs appear) that will help some more:
 - https://go-review.googlesource.com/c/23042/ (compact value IDs in SSA before regalloc)
 - https://go-review.googlesource.com/c/23211/ (use SCC to limit iteration in sparse phi placement)
